verses.verse: Thou <S%G4771><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> son <S%G5043><s%>, be strong <S%G1743><s%> <S%G5744><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> that is in <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the things <S%G3739><s%> that thou hast heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> among <S%G1223><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> witnesses <S%G3144><s%>, the same <S%G5023><s%> commit thou <S%G3908><s%> <S%G5639><s%> to faithful <S%G4103><s%> men <S%G444><s%>, who <S%G3748><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%> able <S%G2425><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> <S%G5658><s%> others <S%G2087><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>.
Thou <S%G4771><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> endure hardness <S%G2553><s%> <S%G5657><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> soldier <S%G4757><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>.

No man <S%G3762><s%> that warreth <S%G4754><s%> <S%G5734><s%> entangleth himself <S%G1707><s%> <S%G5743><s%> with the affairs <S%G4230><s%> of this life <S%G979><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> he may please <S%G700><s%> <S%G5661><s%> him who hath chosen him to be a soldier <S%G4758><s%> <S%G5660><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> strive <S%G118><s%> <S%G5725><s%> for masteries, yet is he <S%G4737><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> crowned <S%G4737><s%> <S%G5743><s%>, except <S%G3362><s%> he strive <S%G118><s%> <S%G5661><s%> Torahfully <S%G3545><s%>.
The husbandman <S%G1092><s%> that laboureth <S%G2872><s%> <S%G5723><s%> must be <S%G1163><s%> <S%G5748><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> partaker <S%G3335><s%> <S%G5721><s%> of the fruits <S%G2590><s%>.

Consider <S%G3539><s%> <S%G5720><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%>; and <S%G1063><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5630><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> understanding <S%G4907><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>.

Remember <S%G3421><s%> <S%G5720><s%> that Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the seed <S%G4690><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%> was raised <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5772><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%>:

Wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I suffer trouble <S%G2553><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> an evil doer <S%G2557><s%>, even unto <S%G3360><s%> bonds <S%G1199><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G1210><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> <S%G5769><s%>.

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> I endure <S%G5278><s%> <S%G5719><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> for <S%G1588><s%> the elect's <S%G1588><s%> sakes <S%G1223><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they <S%G846><s%> may <S%G5177><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> obtain <S%G5177><s%> <S%G5632><s%> the salvation <S%G4991><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>.

It is a faithful <S%G4103><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%>: For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> we be dead with <S%G4880><s%> <S%G5627><s%> him, we shall <S%G4800><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> live with <S%G4800><s%> <S%G5692><s%> him:

If <S%G1487><s%> we suffer <S%G5278><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, we shall <S%G4821><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> reign with <S%G4821><s%> <S%G5692><s%> him: if <S%G1487><s%> we deny <S%G720><s%> <S%G5736><s%> him, he also <S%G2548><s%> will deny <S%G720><s%> <S%G5695><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>:

If <S%G1487><s%> we believe not <S%G569><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, yet he <S%G1565><s%> abideth <S%G3306><s%> <S%G5719><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%>: he cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%> deny <S%G720><s%> <S%G5664><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>.

Of these things <S%G5023><s%> put them in remembrance <S%G5279><s%> <S%G5720><s%>, charging <S%G1263><s%> <S%G5740><s%> them before <S%G1799><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> that they strive <S%G3054><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> about words <S%G3054><s%> <S%G5721><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> profit <S%G5539><s%>, but to <S%G1909><s%> the subverting <S%G2692><s%> of the hearers <S%G191><s%> <S%G5723><s%>.

Study <S%G4704><s%> <S%G5657><s%> to shew <S%G3936><s%> <S%G5658><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%> approved <S%G1384><s%> unto 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, a workman <S%G2040><s%> that needeth not to be ashamed <S%G422><s%>, rightly dividing <S%G3718><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of truth <S%G225><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> shun <S%G4026><s%> <S%G5732><s%> profane <S%G952><s%> and vain babblings <S%G2757><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> they will increase <S%G4298><s%> <S%G5692><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> ungodliness <S%G763><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> will eat <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5692><s%> <S%G3542><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> doth a canker <S%G1044><s%>: of whom <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> Hymenaeus <S%G5211><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Philetus <S%G5372><s%>;

Who <S%G3748><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> have erred <S%G795><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%> that the resurrection <S%G386><s%> is past <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5755><s%> already <S%G2235><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> overthrow <S%G396><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> of some <S%G5100><s%>.

Nevertheless <S%G3305><s%> the foundation <S%G2310><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> standeth <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5707><s%> <S%G5758><s%> sure <S%G4731><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> seal <S%G4973><s%>, The YY <S%G2962><s%> knoweth <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5627><s%> them that are <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> his <S%G846><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%>, Let <S%G868><s%> every one <S%G3956><s%> that nameth <S%G3687><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> depart <S%G868><s%> <S%G5628><s%> from <S%G575><s%> iniquity <S%G93><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> there are <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> vessels <S%G4632><s%> of gold <S%G5552><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of silver <S%G693><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of wood <S%G3585><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of earth <S%G3749><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> some <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> honour <S%G5092><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G3739><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> dishonour <S%G819><s%>.

If <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> purge <S%G1571><s%> <S%G5661><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> from <S%G575><s%> these <S%G5130><s%>, he shall be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%> a vessel <S%G4632><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> honour <S%G5092><s%>, sanctified <S%G37><s%> <S%G5772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> meet <S%G2173><s%> for the master's use <S%G1203><s%>, and prepared <S%G2090><s%> <S%G5772><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work <S%G2041><s%>.

Flee <S%G5343><s%> <S%G5720><s%> also <S%G1161><s%> youthful <S%G3512><s%> lusts <S%G1939><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> follow <S%G1377><s%> <S%G5720><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>, faith <S%G4102><s%>, charity <S%G26><s%>, peace <S%G1515><s%>, with <S%G3326><s%> them that call on <S%G1941><s%> <S%G5734><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> a pure <S%G2513><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> foolish <S%G3474><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unlearned <S%G521><s%> questions <S%G2214><s%> avoid <S%G3868><s%> <S%G5737><s%>, knowing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5761><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they do gender <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5719><s%> strifes <S%G3163><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the servant <S%G1401><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> strive <S%G3164><s%> <S%G5738><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> be <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> gentle <S%G2261><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men, apt to teach <S%G1317><s%>, patient <S%G420><s%>,

In <S%G1722><s%> meekness <S%G4236><s%> instructing <S%G3811><s%> <S%G5723><s%> those that oppose themselves <S%G475><s%> <S%G5734><s%>; if <S%G3379><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> peradventure <S%G3379><s%> will give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5632><s%> them <S%G846><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the acknowledging <S%G1922><s%> of the truth <S%G225><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> that they may recover themselves <S%G366><s%> <S%G5661><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the snare <S%G3803><s%> of the devil <S%G1228><s%>, who are taken captive <S%G2221><s%> <S%G5772><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> him <S%G846><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G1565><s%> will <S%G2307><s%>.
